input.content: You are navigating an 8x8 maze. Use the step tool with action: 0 (up), 1 (down), 2 (left), or 3 (right). The observation shows your current position, legal actions, and whether you reached the exit. Navigate to the exit to earn a reward.
Find your way to the exit of the maze.
